ygData.subject: Re: Patch day...
ygData.msgSnippet: It s a fairly useless spell that replaces another fairly useless spell. You can use it to find North. Compare with Sense Direction (The spell is much more
ygData.messageBody:
It's a fairly useless spell that replaces another fairly useless spell.
You can use it to find North.
Compare with Sense Direction (The spell is much more reliable at lower
levels) and a compass (costs 2 plat).
At low levels it is probably worth having but by level 12 or so your Sense
Direction skill is likely high enough you wont bother with this.
Early on however when your totally turned around in a big zone (especially
in the rain or night) this could be very handy.
So once in awhile it will be useful for a low level character.





"Alex Tan" <atan@...>
02/17/00 08:01 PM
Please respond to eqenchanters


To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Patch day...

From: "Alex Tan" <atan@...>

Sorry but to ask, what's the spell "True North" for?

Tiffa Dancinsword
30th Enchanteress in Sisters without Mercy!!

----- Original Message -----
> - "Sense Magic" has been replaced in all cases by the "True North"
spell.
If
> you have already inscribed the "Sense Magic" spell, the spell icon will
now
> automatically reflect "True North".
